name: The Manifest
description:
The Manifest is an adult-themed game made in Ren'Py following the life of a State Trooper, re-assigned to the local Police Department as the City of Manston is hit by an unprecedented crime wave.

You'll be able to decide what paths to follow, if you want to spend time with your wife and step-daughter, focus on assisting the Police Department at the local campus, or hunt down the villians that injured your partner, along with romancing the different girls you find attractive along the way.

Choices matter, and you'll have completely different game-experiences depending on what you choose to do!
